credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Design for Knotted Pile Hanging with Menorah
medium: Brush and gouache and blue watercolor, graphite, red crayon on brown textured paper
description: In white textured rectangle, a seven-branched, orange menorah with lit candles.  Between branches and lights, the word "Yisrael" in blue Hebrew characters.  On verso, in graphite, a vertical oval with two horizontal crescent shapes and five circles across center.
name: Drawing
